snippet.title: Skull and Bones: PC Features Trailer [EXP]
snippet.description:
Experience Skull and Bones on PC in the Ubisoft Store, releasing November 8, 2022.
PRE-ORDER AVAILABLE:  https://ubi.li/loPfx

Enter the perilous paradise of Skull and Bones™, inspired by the Indian Ocean during the Golden Age of Piracy, as you overcome the odds and rise from an outcast to an infamous pirate.

PC FEATURES
- Uncapped FPS
- Support of 4K & HDR
- Graphical Customization
- DLSS
-Wide-Screen Support
-Controller Options
- Ray Tracing
- and more

For more info, go to: https://www.skullandbonesgame.com
Skull and Bones will be included in Ubisoft+! Available on Day 1.

REGISTER FOR FUTURE LIVE TESTS AT 
www.skullandbonesgame.com/live 

 FOLLOW US
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skullandbonesgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/skullnbonesgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SKullandBonesGame
